attributes.action: allow free option choices of subjects to be chosen by the students themselves in Key Stage 4
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Allowing students to chose the option subjects they would want to do for their GCSE's would be better as they would choose subjects that they enjoy and are good at. 

So its more likely that their grades would be better and it would make the schools overall grades higher.
